title: Last of injured DART officers released from hospital
content:
The last of three Dallas Area Rapid Transit (DART) officers injured in Thursday night's shooting attack has been released from the hospital.
DART said Sunday that Officer Misty McBride was released Saturday. Officers Elmar Cannon and Jesus Retana were released earlier this weekend.
Officer Brent Thompson, who had worked for the department since 2009, was killed when suspect Micah X. Johnson used a rifle to fire upon officers who were managing a peaceful rally through downtown Dallas.
The group was protesting recent deaths of African American men by police officers outside of Texas.
Five officers were killed.
A GoFundMe has been set up to help support Thompson's family.
Go here to find out more.
